description: The information contained in this notice is a brief description of the requirement and is for information purposes only. Bidders must refer to the complete RFP document for a full description of the requirement and the full bid instructions.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Envelope [EC50385, EC50386, EC50387 & EC50420]

## Background

Elections Canada requires the acquisition of electoral material, including envelopes with gussets. The Chief Electoral Officer of Canada (CEOC) exercises general direction and supervision over the conduct of elections and referendums at the federal level.

## Requirement

The Contract, including the Statement of Work (SOW), outlines the specific goods and services required by Elections Canada.

## Security

There is no security requirement applicable to this procurement.

## Period of the Contract

The Contract period will commence on the effective date of the Contract and extend until March 31, 2024.

## Submission of Proposals

Bidders may submit their proposals through the epost Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation. References to Part 2 of the RFP Instructions and Proposal Preparation are requested for further information.

## Contract Details

The Contracting Authority is Elections Canada. Interested parties should note that only the Contracting Authority will be the primary contact for enquiries.

## Evaluation and Selection Criteria

The selection methodology is Competitive Procurement Strategy: Lowest Cost.

## Language of Documents

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Notice and Solicitation Documents

The solicitation documents for this Request for Proposal (RFP) are accessible through the Government of Canada's procurement website at [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders).

## Trade Agreements and Regions

This procurement is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA). The region of opportunity is the National Capital Region (NCR), and the region of delivery is also the NCR.

## Contact Information

For further information or to submit proposals, please direct all enquiries and communication to the Contracting Authority:

* Name: Sufia Fuentes
* Email: proposition-proposal@elections.ca
* Phone: 873-415-0446

**Please note that only the Contracting Authority will be the primary contact for enquiries.** [1]

It is essential to read carefully through the complete RFP document for a full description of the requirement and the full bid instructions.
